title: Ticket #243: gittrac Notify on commit effecting ticket
description:
We now have email notification from the Notify list when tickets are changed via the gittrac web interface. Commits can also be associated with tickets by adding the ticket number to the commit's message.

It would be nice if these two things worked together. A commit for ticket #3 would result in an email to those on #3's Notify list.
